mapper.select: SELECT chat_subquery.*, club.club_name, pro.renamed_filename, m.nickname FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM chat_log WHERE club_id = #{clubId} ORDER BY id DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) chat_subquery JOIN club ON chat_subquery.club_Id = club.club_id join club_profile pro on club.club_id = pro.club_id join member m on chat_subquery.writer = m.member_id
select c.club_id, c.club_name, pro.renamed_filename from club c join club_profile pro on c.club_id= pro.club_id where c.club_id= #{clubId}

select chat.*, m.nickname, pro.renamed_filename from chat_log chat join member m on chat.writer = m.member_Id join member_profile pro on chat.writer = pro.member_id where chat.club_id=#{no} order by chat.id
